conclusion: Identify the forces acting on the sled: weight of child, weight of sled, normal force, applied force, frictional force.
Calculate total mass of sled and child: 40 kg.
Determine total weight of sled and child: 400 N.
Resolve applied force into vertical component: 60 N.
Resolve applied force into horizontal component: 80 N.
Apply equilibrium conditions to determine normal force: 340 N.
Calculate pressure exerted by sled on ground: 340 Pa.
